sessions.summary: Fixed live playback of in-progress recordings. Root cause: camera_stream.py was missing -movflags frag_keyframe+empty_moov FFmpeg flags, causing MP4 files to be unplayable until complete. Added fragmented MP4 flags and implemented StreamingResponse for in-progress files in playback API.

Implemented collapsible camera sidebar for Live View. Added collapsed state with status dots, localStorage persistence, and toggle button. Sidebar collapses to 48px width showing only camera status indicators.

Implemented real-time motion detection in the live detection worker. Added per-camera MotionDetector pool using MOG2 background subtraction, integrated motion detection into the segment processing pipeline with cooldown/debouncing, added cleanup for removed cameras, and added orange color for motion bounding boxes in snapshots.

Fixed in-progress recording playback issue where timeline would jump erratically. Root cause: Range requests were not being handled for in-progress recordings - the endpoint advertised Accept-Ranges: bytes but always streamed from beginning. Also improved fMP4 movflags with default_base_moof for better browser seeking support.
